dw:transform-message.doc:name: Transform Message
dw:transform-message.dw:set-payload: %dw 1.0 %output application/csv --- payload.Root.Customers.*Customer map ((customer , indexOfCustomer) -> { first_name: getFirstName(customer.ContactName), last_name: getLastName(customer.ContactName), company_name: customer.CompanyName, address: customer.FullAddress.Address, city: customer.FullAddress.City, county: customer.FullAddress.Country, state: "", zip: customer.FullAddress.PostalCode, phone1: customer.Phone, phone2: customer.Fax, email: "", web: "" })
